casebody.data:
John DOE 1K and John Doe 2K
v.
ROMAN CATHOLIC DIOCESE OF CHARLOTTE, NC. No. 329P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Sam McGee, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Doe, John (1K). Joshua D. Davey, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Roman Catholic Diocese of Charlotte, NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of September 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
